hue a charming hand drawn styled puzzle game it has very cool and unique mechanics and can be very challenging at times the story unlocks as you progress which is very interesting and i found it well written this is the best puzzle game i have played and honestly its an artistic masterpiece that only few will come to appreciate if your into puzzle games or wanna get into them this is the one
amazing game  wish i knew of more like it  i would like to see additional areas in dlc and would love to see new mechanics in a sequel

great game  hue is a 2d puzzle platformer that focuses on changing a scenes color its honestly a challenging game in most cases youll have to figure out which color to use to showhide certain objects levels do progressively get harder even by adding new mechanics  the only issue i had was the ui sometimes interacting with the buttons doesnt always register
fun little puzzle game  i understand why every was hyped about it but im seeing very little replay value

youll change colors change dimensions and maybe change your sanity level  but hue makes every moment worth it its a clever little platformer where swapping the background color rewrites the rules and your brain gets a full workout trying to keep up  charming definitely challenging more than youd think regret only when i swap to orange midjump and erase the platform under me
great puzzle game

tldr its a satisfying puzzle game with a good plot and excellent music  the puzzles offer a good bit of challenge without being so hard you need to check out a youtube video or a wiki for the solution the plot is pretty simple more of a justification for why the gameworld is the way it is but it still is able to pull you in and keep you invested while you move through the game
it was a fun 6ish hours really enjoyed it  the music and the little voice notes were great

wonderful little game if you are looking for something light relaxing yet challenging this is a perfect game for you the music is really nice as well and i just love how you use colors to solve puzzles but also give a mood of your choice to any room youre in  the story is also nice and touching adding an additional nice cozy and heartwarming flavor to the game  definitely check it out
